thread.title: 13 Things Remember If You've Ever Been To Blockbuster
thread.title_full: 13 Things You'll Remember If You've Ever Been To Blockbuster

author: Matt Stopera
title: 13 Things Remember If You've Ever Been To Blockbuster
text:
View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493692 3. Step 2: Make your first lap around the perimeter. Stare endlessly and soullessly at the new releases. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493681 4. Step 3: Realize you’ve seen everything. Take another lap. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493696 5. Step 4: 20 minutes pass. You’re still at Blockbuster. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493698 6. Step 5: You’re desperate. You’re picking up movies you’ve never heard of. That shit went straight to video for a reason. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493682 7. Step 6: Yawn. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493701 8. Step 7: Hate yourself. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493680 9. Step 8: Question your will to live. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493700 10. Step 9: You think you’ve found the one. Then you find out that your friend has already seen the movie. You put the movie back in failure. You suck. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493683 11. Step 10: Fuck it all. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493685 12. Step 11: Get desperate. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493691 13. Step 12: Pick out Paul Blart: Mall Cop . Stare at the candy in the aisle while you check out. Fantasize about getting those chocolate chip cookie dough bite things. Be glad this is almost over. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493689 14. Step 13: After 45 minutes, you finally leave. You probably have renters regret. You have, again, succumbed to the Blockbuster time suck. View this image ›
Fameflynet ID: 10493994 15. Have a good night! ID: 10499158
 More News About Britney Spears
